definition: Sanbao Eunuch, official title of Zheng He 鄭和|郑和[Zheng4 He2]/also written 三保太監|三保太监
see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]
pinyin: huang2 shang4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2

definition: see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]
pinyin: huang2 shang4 bu4 ji2 ji2 tai4 jian4

definition: lit. the emperor is not worried, but his eunuchs are (idiom)/fig. the observers are more anxious than the person involved
pinyin: huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2

definition: see 皇帝不急太監急|皇帝不急太监急[huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 tai4 jian4 ji2]
pinyin: huang2 di4 bu4 ji2 ji2 si3 tai4 jian4

sentences.english: Chongzhen suicided together with a eunuch Wang Chengen.
sentences.chinese: 崇自杀连同一个太监王成恩。

sentences.english: There were twoor three eunuchs inside.
sentences.chinese: 我循声望去，看到了两三个太监站在她旁边。

sentences.english: Xiao li fly knife moment, KuangXiang into little eunuch.
sentences.chinese: 小李飞刀一瞬间，匡翔变成小太监。

sentences.english: Who?' Two or three eunuchs looked down at him.
sentences.chinese: 有两三个太监从窗户往外看他。

sentences.english: The nun was the odalisque, the priest was the eunuch.
sentences.chinese: 修女是宫嫔，神甫是太监。

sentences.english: The contingent of two hundred guards and eunuchs was still there, standing stiffly to attention.
sentences.chinese: 只见一众侍卫太监仍是直挺挺的站着不动。

sentences.english: Blessed are the eunuchs, for they shall obtain an everlasting name.
sentences.chinese: 做太监的人有福了，因为他们必名垂千古。

sentences.english: Eunuch is eunuch, how could a castrated person achieve great things?
sentences.chinese: 太监毕竟是太监，一个阉过的人干出什么大事也呢？

sentences.english: Eunuch is eunuch, how could a castrated person achieve great things?
sentences.chinese: 太监毕竟是太监，一个阉过的人干出什么大事也呢？

sentences.english: The court sent down Eunuch Zhuo Feng to inquire into my failure, and that official demanded a bribe.
sentences.chinese: 法庭带下太监卓峰调查我的失败，官方要求贿赂。

sentences.english: All the wrestlers and eunuchs present applauded enthusiastically.
sentences.chinese: 众武士和太监齐声喝采。

sentences.english: For instance, Tong Guan is a eunuch, so he is a little gay.
sentences.chinese: 比如，童贯是太监，因此他会有一点同性恋情结。

sentences.english: So "they both went down into the water, Philip and the eunuch , and he baptized him."
sentences.chinese: 于是“腓利和太监二人同下水里去，腓利就给他施洗。

sentences.english: There were thousands of eunuchs in the palace.
A castrated man employed as a harem attendant or as a functionary in certain Asian courts.
sentences.chinese: 宦官，太监某些亚洲宫廷内，在内宫侍候。

definition: Wei Zhongxian (1568-1627), infamous eunuch politician of late Ming
imperial concubine or palace maid/imperial secretary (old)
place at the imperial court, where emperor handled government affairs, gave orders etc
the emperor/Your majesty the emperor/His imperial majesty
